titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of 1,6-hexamethylene diiosocyanate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E909)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on 1,6-hexamethylene diisocyanate.
